item.description:
Juno is a whip-smart teen confronting an unplanned pregnancy by her classmate Bleeker. With the help of her hot best friend Leah, Juno finds her unborn child a "perfect" set of parents: an affluent suburban couple, Mark and Vanessa, longing to adopt. Luckily, Juno has the total support of her parents as she faces some tough decisions, flirts with adulthood and ultimately figures out where she belongs.

Genres: Comedy, Drama and Teen
Running Time: 1 hr. 31 min.
Release Date: December 5th, 2007 (limited)
MPAA Rating: PG-13 for mature thematic material, sexual content and language.

Starring: Ellen Page, Michael Cera, Olivia Thirlby, Jennifer Garner, Jason Bateman
Directed by: Jason Reitman

Yahoo! Movies entry

IMDb entry
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet on the couches in the gallery, just outside the theater at 6:45. We will re-gather there after the movie, if anyone missed us.
item.why: We'll see the movie (for free) and then walk downtown for a drink and discussion afterward
item.name: NPL Film: Juno
